评论详情: I always get so many compliments on this hoodie. I can make a plain tank top look interesting and more lively. The material is nice, especially the snake printed part near the hood. I love the buckle and chains, they make for a really nice addition. Looks expensive in comparison to the price.

Unfortunately, I was super excited to receive this item, but the fabric was super thin and honestly ran a little baggy. I ended up giving it away. Love the concept, but because it was untrue to size and the material looked thicker than it was I’m gonna give it two stars.
I love this shrug, it's different, fits well and the fishnet/vinyl combo is so sexy!

The jacket itself is very cute.  The low rating is due to fact it has an image of Baphomet that covers the entire back of jacket. This is NOT mentioned in the description or shown on any of the stock photos.  I know who I am, and whose I am. I would have never ordered if I'd known this was a feature on the jacket.
I'm usually a large, I ordered an XL and it was still too small. However, this is super cute and I do like it. Just a little tight

Poorly made, grommets are not spaced apart the same throughout, arms are too tight and too long, laces for the arms and back were flimsy and low quality making it difficult to lace & arrived loose in the bag not attached to the hoodie. This hoodie should be $10. low quality materials.

I sized 1 up, should of just stuck to my regular size. Fits true size. Stretchy, you can change up the straps however you want to clip or hang. Has lots of loops. I got so many compliments. Definitely wearing it some more times.

Returning- This is literally for a child lol. If you are a size xs - small, the Large will probably fit you fine. Too bad cuz it's super cool - guess I'll have to make my own so it actually fits me. Also the thumb holes seem to be in the wrong place - the sleeve seam has to twist around your arm for your thumb to go through the hole - of course if it was normal size and not so incredibly tight it might not be a problem, hard to tell. Super bummed.
Concert attire!!

it's cute, comes exactly how its shown in the pictures, but you DEFINITELY want to size up. also this WILL NOT fit you if you have some weight, the sleeves are VERY tight and have very little elasticity. the material also feels weird, especially on the arms (im autistic so im picky about texture), it is *still* a very cute hoodie-sweatshirt thingy!
Ordered a bunch of punk style clothes for my rock performance next week, I am obsessed now!!!!!!
It is good quality and comfortable, and I really love the style. It fit perfect!

Super cute top that matches image description but RUNS SMALL. (Buy a size larger!) I’m 5’6” 118lbs and purchased a Medium that fits like a S. Difficult to get your head through because of how tight the mask is stitched in; also afraid to wash it in case it shrinks further.

Other than that if it were to fit appropriately it's cute and I would love it.

I had to return it as my shoulders were way too broad for this product. This is definitely a woman's only product. I couldn't even take it off myself and needed my boyfriend's help. Hooks are a bit fragile and sleeves are a bit tight but they're ment for women's arms. Still give it five stars for being cute.

Let me start off with I absolutely ADORE THIS CROP TOP HOODIE!!  I've used it with a few different outfits (primarily all crop tops) and it hasn't ever failed to make every single one of them come out as stunning. When I first got it out of the bag I would say than it is a little on the thin-ish side regarding material layers but it isn't incredibly thin either.  Finding the hole as to where your thumb is supposed to go through was a little bit of a conundrum trying to figure that part out but once you do it the first time you've got it down from there.  It definitely fits true to size and id have to say than I was incredibly impressed, I'm extremely happy with the purchase and would 1000% recommend this if anyone is looking for a very cute crop top hoodie, just know than this isn't necessarily a winter Crop top hoodie because of the thinness.

评论概述: Not what is pictured in the product shots
评论详情: I'm attaching photos, so you can see how the product differs from the images they used. I believe this is an "Amazon knock-off". What you get has significantly less grommets. The lacing ends just before the start of the hood (in their picture it goes onto the hood). On the sleeves, you only get 4 grommets on each side, their pictures show double that amount. The stitching is also problematic. The laces that come with it you have to lace yourself, and they have no end-caps, meaning they will unravel with use.  Overall, I gave it 4 stars, because it suits my purposes, and I will keep it. It fits me well. I ordered a S, but I am typically an XS, as I am a size 0-1. I am 5'1, and 100 lbs. So, you may want to size up one size. The fabric is soft and stretchy. I do like the feel of the fabric. I bought this for layering purposes in fall, and I think it suits that. It is cute, but definitely a knock-off. I hope my photos help you decide.
